meta.content: Our 2nd Graders put on a virtual wax museum every year! It is a great way to learn about the important people in our past. Check out the videos below!

font.b: --- Online Learning Resumes April 6th --- Jump Rope for Heart Donations Due April 17th

strong.font: Watch Mr. Warren's Latest Update Here or Click on the Button Below to See More

div.blockquote: Posted by Island City Academy on Tuesday, April 28, 2020

strong.font: Our 2nd Graders put on a virtual wax museum every year! It is a great way to learn about the important people in our past. Check out the videos below!
Michigan Virtual recently launched a new Michigan Cares website for families and educators to provide resources and activities for supporting the social and emotional well-being of students.

Island City will be CLOSED from March 16 through the end of the school year due to the school closures put in place by the state government. Staff will be available via email. The office will be open during normal business hours but children are not allowed in the building.

td.div: All money goes towards 8th grade trip Cost: $5 ​
